clumpy.transition_probability_estimation.Bayes¶

class clumpy.transition_probability_estimation.Bayes(density_estimator='gkde', n_corrections_max=1000, log_computations=False, verbose=0, verbose_heading_level=1)[source]¶

Bases: clumpy.transition_probability_estimation._tpe.TransitionProbabilityEstimator

Bayes transition probability estimator.

Parameters

  • density_estimator ({'gkde'} or DensityEstimator, default='gkde') – Density estimator used for \(P(Y|u)\). If string, a new object is invoked with default parameters.

  • n_corrections_max (int, default=1000) – Maximum number of corrections during the bayesian adjustment algorithm.

  • log_computations (bool, default=False) – If True, bayesian computations are made through log sums.

  • verbose (int, default=0) – Verbosity level.

  • verbose_heading_level (int, default=1) – Verbose heading level for markdown titles. If 0, no markdown title are printed.

Methods

add_conditional_density_estimator(state[, de])

Add conditional density for a given final state.

check()

Check the density estimators uniqueness.

fit(X, V)

Fit the transition probability estimators.

transition_probability(transition_matrix, Y)

Estimates transition probability.
add_conditional_density_estimator(state, de='gkde')[source]¶

Add conditional density for a given final state.

Parameters

  • state (State) – The final state.

  • de ({'gkde'} or DensityEstimator, default='gkde') –

    Density estimation for \(P(x|u,v)\).

    gkde : Gaussian Kernel Density Estimation method

Returns

self – The self object.

Return type

Land

check()¶

Check the density estimators uniqueness.

fit(X, V)[source]¶

Fit the transition probability estimators. Only \(P(Y|u,v)\) is concerned.

Parameters

  • X (array-like of shape (n_samples, n_features)) – Observed features data.

  • V (array-like of shape (n_samples,) of int type) – The final land use state values. Only studied final v should appear.

  • u (int) – The initial land use state.

Returns

self – The fitted transition probability estimator object.

Return type

TransitionProbabilityEstimator

transition_probability(transition_matrix, Y)[source]¶

Estimates transition probability. Non estimated final states transition probabilities are filled to the null value.

Parameters

  • transition_matrix (TransitionMatrix) – Land transition matrix with only one state in tm.palette_u.

  • Y (array-like of shape (n_samples, n_features)) – Samples to estimate transition probabilities

Returns

P_v__Y – Transition probabilities for each studied final land use states ordered as transition_matrix.palette_v.

Return type

ndarray of shape (n_samples, n_transitions)
